#summary Built-in JsDoc Service

= The !JsDoc Service =

|| http://frizione.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/Images/jsdoc.png || From the project home page you can select the !JavaScript files to generate documentation for... ||

The !JsDoc files contain a simple syntax to define the files to be documented, and where the HTML files are to be saved:
{{{
  /*jsdoc src: /frizione-projects/clutch/js/dev/browser.js
          src: /frizione-projects/clutch/js/dev/introspect.js
          src: /frizione-projects/clutch/js/dev/string.js
          src: /frizione-projects/clutch/js/dev/unit-test.js
          src: /frizione-projects/clutch/js/dev/gears
            d: /../docs/clutch
            s: true */
}}}

|| The !JsDoc results page displays the document generation information. || http://frizione.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/Images/jsdoc-result.png ||

|| http://frizione.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/Images/clutch-documentation.png || The HTML documentation pages can then be accessed by your browser. ||
